so this is just a video??? ummm anyone know where I can download the actual game???

It is a game. It works. If you installed it and you click on the game. All you must do is press enter if the game is going to start. Then the first level begins and you can play it yourself. If you don't press enter then the video is going to start. So press enter and the game  begins. Great game by the way:P
